name: Thirst Comes First
description:
Description

In Thirst Comes First, you have to run around a map of your choice, trying to collect beverages to keep your hydration healthy! If you run out of hydration, you'll die of thirst!

Credits

Developed by TheLuchenator

Music and Sounds by TheLuchenator

Models and Assets by TheLuchenator

Font: Dela Gothic One by artakana

Submitted for the MFGJ Game Jam

Game Jam Theme

The MFGJ Gam Jam's theme was Heal. I went about this by making you collect beverages to refuel your hydration. Or, in other words, HEAL your hydration.  ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Other Words

If you want, you can play this in your browser, or you can download to your PC to play from there. Have fun! :D
